channel.title: Editing Stat bonuses
channel.description:
Need Help with editing stat bonuses... as in, how? Someone must have the answer, so a little help would be much appreciated. Its probably about changing some numbers somewhere, I just want to change the Rubber Chicken (to add some irony to my server :D ) to an almighty weapon.
Well solving my own problem here I'm thinking its something to do with Item.CFG
Got it. If you looked at this and also wanted to know it IS to do with Item.CFG
The first 3 Numbers correspond with money. The next 5 correspond with Stab, Slash, Crush, Magic and Range ATTACK The next 5 correspond with Stab, Slash, Crush, Magic and Range DEFENCE The last 2 correspond with Strength and Prayer
Not many reading so I am guessing most of you know, but for those who didn't I hope you understand it now.

item.title: Editing Stat bonuses
item.dc:creator: @HelpmePl0x HelpmePl0x
item.description:
@HelpmePl0x wrote:

Need Help with editing stat bonuses… as in, how?
Someone must have the answer, so a little help would be much appreciated.
Its probably about changing some numbers somewhere, I just want to change the Rubber Chicken (to add some irony to my server ) to an almighty weapon.

Well solving my own problem here I’m thinking its something to do with Item.CFG

Got it. If you looked at this and also wanted to know it IS to do with Item.CFG

The first 3 Numbers correspond with money.
The next 5 correspond with Stab, Slash, Crush, Magic and Range ATTACK
The next 5 correspond with Stab, Slash, Crush, Magic and Range DEFENCE
The last 2 correspond with Strength and Prayer

Not many reading so I am guessing most of you know, but for those who didn’t I hope you understand it now.
